text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium antarcticum is an ubiquitous, endophytic fungus species of the genus Penicillium. Penicillium antarcticum produces the polyketide compounds antarone A and antarone B.It was originally discovered on the Windmill Islands off Antarctica, thus its name.
text.Further reading: Helga Stan-Lotter; Sergiu Fendrihan (2011). Adaption of Microbial Life to Environmental Extremes: Novel Research Results and Application. Springer. ISBN 3211996907.
